UnstableMap.text: (Unstable Map, Try With Lowest Graphics Settings)

PleaseWait.text: Please Wait For The Task to Finish

DownloadingWarn.text: Downloads Are Still In Progress Press Cancel To Stop The Download

WaitTaskFinish.text: Please Wait For Task To Finish

Start_button_tip.text: Start the game with the selected map, if a map is not selected game will use defaults

gGameTypeDrop.text: Select which game type you are using

Custom_exe_button.text: When enabled the game will use OpenSpy for the multiplayer server, allowing you to play online

Custom_levels_button.text: When enabled new AI difficulties are added, they are Iron Trader, Railway Magnate, Steel Baron, Empire Builder and finally Railroad Titan, these add an extra challenge for those that want it

Editor_button.text: When enabled the game will show the map editor menu, there you can create your own map

unload_map.text: Unload the custom map so the game starts with defaults

languageDrop.text: Select your language you will need to restart the launcher for this to take effect

languageAudioDrop.text: Select your voice for text to speech mission reading, if empty click the right button to download a voice Recommended for English is “en_US-norman-medium”

downnload_audio_lang.text: Download a new audio text to speech voice that is used to read mission briefings

voice_heading.text: Click a voice to install or update:

voice_sub_heading.text: Dates load in background — failed fetches retry every time you open this window

voice_download_sub_heading.text: Please wait until the current download finishes before closing the window
